questions.description: Simon and I were trying to be serious for our engagement pictures. We were so happy that we would soon be married that all we could do was giggle, laugh, and act like little kids!  Wedding day is here! That time went so quickly. I'm having my makeup and hair done by a professional. Mom's having hers done too! Everything MUST be perfect for this day. Everything WAS perfect for the ceremony. It went off exactly as planned right at the edge of the ocean with our family and friends surrounding us with their love. However, come time for some serious pictures and Simon couldn't contain himself.  He announced to everyone that he could do a pinwheel somersault over my head and then finish the pinwheel in the water. Well, he got over my head, but wound up IN the water, face first. Happy that all that was hurt was his pride. I'm sure with all the photographs that were taken we will at least have SOME that will truly show our love for each other, just like this one does. It was totally not posed. The photographer just caught us in an intimate moment, and it came out perfectly! We are so happy to be man and wife!
